name: The Betting and Gaming Council
goal: The Betting and Gaming Council (BGC) is the single industry association for betting and gaming, representing betting shops, online gaming businesses and casinos. Its mission is to champion industry standards in betting and gaming to ensure an enjoyable, fair and safe betting and gaming experience for all our customers.
interests: Competition, Digital economy and society, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Anti-Money Laundering Directive (AMLD)
CEN standardisation process for online gambling reporting requirements
Digital Single Market
VAT
